title: 820-02020 drawing 20v but not charging battery
message:
The board came in not  drawing 5v. Ammeter is not coming up
I detected a shot on PPVBUS_USBC0
I replaced DF622 and DF602
It’s now drawing 20v, it’s booting to password screen. But is not drawing charging current.
the amp meter restarts in 20v sometimes but now every time.

title: 820-02020 drawing 20v but not charging battery
message:
You should test with known good battery.
Is the battery at least recognized by macOS?

Here is where a tool like NLBA1 can help you to confirm if a battery is good or not.
Can even help you to recover it, depending of the internal failure.

BTW, important advice for all those who have NLBA1 in the repair shop.
When encounter strange issue with a battery, please upload screenshots.
The developer (Nicusor) told me he will try to help, if he can gather more information for a specific case.

title: 820-02020 drawing 20v but not charging battery
message: I used another known good battery still not charging. The system is booting with charger and it’s working well with another battery only , but the battery is not charging.  The amp meter is not drawing charging current.

title: 820-02020 drawing 20v but not charging battery
message:
If machine works with good battery alone, then recognizes it and there is good communication.
Post Q5265 voltages, with both charger and good battery connected; you may try changing it.

title: 820-02020 drawing 20v but not charging battery
message:
battery connected to board without charger 
PPVBAT_AON_CHGR_R- 11.6v
CHGR_BGATE- 3.7v
PPVBAT_AON-11.6
With charger battery connector to board 
12.7
12.7
11.6
Respectively. 
I should try change wat pls I don’t understand.

title: 820-02020 drawing 20v but not charging battery
message:
We talk about Q5265, no?

Maybe the MOSFET is good, U5200 seems to control it on battery mode.
Change it, just in case.
First, check ohm resistance over C5220/60.

title: 820-02020 drawing 20v but not charging battery
message:
C5520  ohm resis-4.2
C5560.  Ohm repai-3.6
Can a bad cd3217 draws 20v and wount charge battery 
Because the amp meter was looping at 20v before it suddenly became stable itself but wount charge battery. Thanks

title: 820-02020 drawing 20v but not charging battery
message: Machine works good on charger alone, without battery?

title: 820-02020 drawing 20v but not charging battery
message: Yes...the system boot to password with charger alone but the processor does not get hot and shows battery sign with out the battery flex connected

title: 820-02020 drawing 20v but not charging battery
message:
You should get X sign on battery symbol, if not connected.
Save data and do DFU restore, just in case.

title: 820-02020 drawing 20v but not charging battery
message: we just got the password to the system. And we discovered the the system will it boot completely after the password is inputed. It will shut down and restart to password screen and after the password it will load to almost 70% progress bar and shot down again.

title: 820-02020 drawing 20v but not charging battery
message: This system is not booting to Home Screen after imputing password.

title: 820-02020 drawing 20v but not charging battery
message:
"Save data and do DFU restore, just in case."
???

title: 820-02020 drawing 20v but not charging battery
message: Done backup and it’s Not getting to dfu. Tired many times. It wount  boot to home page without battery after the password page.it boot with known good battery but wount charge the battery

title: 820-02020 drawing 20v but not charging battery
message:
Is the battery percentage correctly displayed, when is connected?
Be sure pin 7 of J5151 is 0V.
If not, you can force it with S5190/91.

title: 820-02020 drawing 20v but not charging battery
message:
Yes the battery percentage is correctly display 
And there is 0v on pin 7 of J5151

title: 820-02020 drawing 20v but not charging battery
message: Did you change Q5265?

title: 820-02020 drawing 20v but not charging battery
message: Yes

title: 820-02020 drawing 20v but not charging battery
message: Post PPBUS_AON and PPVBAT_AON voltage, w/ and w/o battery connected.

title: 820-02020 drawing 20v but not charging battery
message:
without battery connected 
PPBUS_AON=12.28v
PPVBAT_AON=12.28v
With battery connected 
PPBUS_AON=12.28v
PPVBAT_AON=12.28v

title: 820-02020 drawing 20v but not charging battery
message:
12.28V is incorrect voltage, without battery.
You've posted 12.7V before; what happened?

title: 820-02020 drawing 20v but not charging battery
message:
Probably it was a mistake then 
PPBUS_AON is 12.28v now

title: 820-02020 drawing 20v but not charging battery
message:
That means M1 doesn't control battery bus.
If battey percentage is correctly displayed, the bus is in good condition.
You may have a problem with M1, or U5200.

Save data and try DFU restore.
